question:
Consider the following statements about the Solibacillus kalamii:
  1. It is a newly discovered bacterium
  2. It has been named after A.P.J Abdul Kalam
  3. It is found only on the International Space Station (ISS) and not on earth
Which of the above statements are correct?
explanation:
All given statements are correct
Scientists at NASA discovered new bacteria on International Space Station (ISS) and name it as Solibacillus kalamii. The bacterium is found only on the International Space Station (ISS) and not on earth.
